title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING THE SUPPLEMENTAL INVESTMENT PROGRAM (SIP) FOR SUPPLEMENTAL APPROPRIATION AMOUNTING TO FIVE MILLION SEVEN HUNDRED FIFTY THOUSAND PESOS AND 00/100 (PHP 5,750,000.00) CHARGEABLE AGAINST PS SAVINGS AND GOVERNMENT EQUITY SURPLUS TO BE UTILIZED FOR THE GRANT OF SERVICE RECOGNITION INCENTIVE TO ALL OFFICIALS, REGULAR AND CASUAL EMPLOYEES OF THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT FOR FY 2025 PURSUANT TO MALACANANG ADMINISTRATIVE ORDER NO. 40 DATED DECEMBER 11, 2025. Author
